UniprotID	P20132

EntryName	SDHL_HUMAN
ProteinName	L-serine dehydratase/L-threonine deaminase (SDH) (EC 4.3.1.17) (Hepatic serine dehydratase) (hSDH) (L-serine deaminase) (L-threonine dehydratase) (TDH) (EC 4.3.1.19)
GeneName	SDS SDH
Length	328
Function	Catalyzes the pyridoxal-phosphate-dependent dehydrative deamination of L-threonine and L-serine to ammonia and alpha-ketobutyrate and pyruvate, respectively.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
